articles.title: POWER FAILURE: 'We do apologise again,' says Eskom as South Africans grapple with Stage 4 load shedding – and a warning of Stage 6 - Daily Maverick

articles.content: Due to further failures of generation units, Eskom announcedregrettably, and with a great deal of disappointment that load shedding would intensify from Stage 2 to 4 on Wednesday. This was to preserv… [+4002 chars]

articles.title: How much money MTN made from Cell C - MyBroadband
articles.description: MTN South Africa recorded a jump in wholesale revenue thanks to the national roaming agreement it has with Cell C.
articles.content:
MTN released its annual results for 2021 on Wednesday, reporting 21.7% increased wholesale revenue in its South African division.
